snippet.title: Johnny Depp Thinks Amber Heard Didn't Donate Divorce Settlement To Charity
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Thinks Amber Heard Didn't Donate Divorce Settlement To Charity
Subscribe To InformOverload: http://bit.ly/2xB5CqA


Way back in 2016 when Amber landed that 7 million dollar divorce settlement she vowed that it would all be used as a donation to a Childrens Hospital, as well as The ACLU. However as TMZ reported, more than 3 months after landing this deal, she had not donated a dime to any charities. Initially when this donation became public as part of the deal, Depp insisted that if that was what she wanted to do with the money than he would be happy to donate it on her behalf. That way the money wouldnt be tied up and it could go directly to the charities. Depp even sent the first installment of the settlement which was 200 thousand dollars in equal shares to the Childrens Hospital and the ACLU. Although this only enraged Amber and so she refused to sign the final settlement which only stalled the court process.Johnny Depp has now issued subpoenas to gather all documents and communication between Ms. Heard and the charities she intended on donating to. Depps lawyers are having some serious doubts that she actually gave the money where the settlement had agreed upon. 

#johnnydepp #amberheard #justiceforjohnnydepp #divorce #charity #settlement #justiceforjohnny #io #informoverload #childrenshospital #aclu

More iO Vids 👇
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KTBhBQvgUoA&list=PLJwoOv1yyb46XC4LbE1ruNJF3gS1UWA30
